# Grandfather's Legacy (Level 14 Necromancer)
## Overview
*This pair of lexicons is covered in excellently preserved human skin, with an intricate lace of fingerbones forming the locks on the cover. A family seal has been embossed on the lower center of the cover, but flecks of gold leaf have begun to peel away, revealing that the embossed pattern in fact follows a faded tattoo on the skin itself.*

**Protection** A series of three superior locks each augmented with *[[Arcane Lock (Spell)|arcane lock]]* (DC 50) and a *[[Symbol of Weakness (Spell)|symbol of weakness]]* (Fortitude DC 20) on the second page of each book.

**Opposition Schools** Enchantment, illusion

**Value** 7,610 gp

**Spells**

7th—*[[Control Undead (Spell)|control undead]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Finger of Death (Spell)|finger of death]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Symbol of Weakness (Spell)|symbol of weakness]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Temporary Resurrection (Spell)|temporary resurrection]]* <sup>S</sup>,

6th—*[[Acid Fog (Spell)|acid fog]]*, *lightning field* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Circle of Death (Spell)|circle of death]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Create Undead (Spell)|create undead]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Unwilling Shield (Spell)|unwilling shield]]* <sup>S</sup>,

5th—*[[Dismissal (Spell)|dismissal]]*, *[[Hold Monster (Spell)|hold monster]]*, *[[Magic Jar (Spell)|magic jar]]* <sup>S</sup>, *transfer intelligence* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]*, *[[Waves of Fatigue (Spell)|waves of fatigue]]* <sup>S</sup>

4th—*[[Animate Dead (Spell)|animate dead]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Bestow Curse (Spell)|bestow curse]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Contagion (Spell)|contagion]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Enervation (Spell)|enervation]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shadow Projection (Spell)|shadow projection]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shout (Spell)|shout]]*, *[[Wall of Ice (Spell)|wall of ice]]*

3rd—*[[Gentle Repose (Spell)|gentle repose]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Halt Undead (Spell)|halt undead]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]*, *[[Magic Circle Against Good (Spell)|magic circle against good]]*, *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]*, *[[Ray of Exhaustion (Spell)|ray of exhaustion]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Stinking Cloud (Spell)|stinking cloud]]*, *[[Vampiric Touch (Spell)|vampiric touch]]* <sup>S</sup>

2nd—*[[Arcane Lock (Spell)|arcane lock]]*, *blindness* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Darkness (Spell)|darkness]]*, *[[False Life (Spell)|false life]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Obscure Object (Spell)|obscure object]]*, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, *[[Scare (Spell)|scare]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Summon Swarm (Spell)|summon swarm]]*

1st—*[[Cause Fear (Spell)|cause fear]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Chill Touch (Spell)|chill touch]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Floating Disk (Spell)|floating disk]]*, *hungry are the dead* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Hypnotism (Spell)|hypnotism]]*, *obscuring fog*, *[[Ray of Enfeeblement (Spell)|ray of enfeeblement]]* <sup>S</sup>, *sculpt corpse* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]*, *[[Sleep (Spell)|sleep]]*

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 124
